caption:
“To suffer is to be refined.”

Reflection:
Pain purifies what comfort conceals. Fire reveals the gold hidden in the soul.

Commentary:
This quote reminds us that suffering, when borne with faith, transforms rather than destroys. It shapes character and deepens compassion.
